title: When is urf coming?
body: WHEN IS URF I WAS TOLD IT WAS THIS FRIDAY BUT NOT

replies.body: URF isn't comming out. ARURF might be though.

Don't know who told you Friday (or if it was just an assumption), but if you refer to the patch notes for 7.24 (specifically the "[Upcoming Events](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-724-notes#patch-upcoming-events)" section) you'll notice it tells you that URF (rather, Snow Battle ARURF) will be available from 20/12/17 at 3:00 am AEDT until 3/1/18 at 2:55am AEDT, so it's actually about a week and a half away. For the rest of the "Snowdown Season" (13/12/17 to 9/1/18), Legend of the Poro King will be available to play.
its coming out next Wednesday fyi{{champion:240}}
